channel.title: Blogdown on Shirin's playgRound
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on Shirin's playgRound

item.title: Moving my blog to blogdown
item.description: It’s been a long time coming but I finally moved my blog from Jekyll and Bootstrap on Github pages to blogdown and Hugo! Yay!!! I followed the blogdown ebook to set up my blog. I chose Thibaud Leprêtre’s tranquilpeak theme. My old blog will remain where it is, so that I don’t have to go through the hassle of migrating all my posts to my new site. You find a link to my old site in the sidebar.
